title: 纽约曼哈顿中城V1.7
txt_content:
本帖最后由 15026926930 于 2016-2-23 13:36 编辑 

http://www.xiami.com/widget/0_1772239839/singlePlayer.swf
大家好今天给大家搬运的又是一个城市地图
作者：BasVerhagen
作者的话：I make a scaled model of Midtown Manhattan. I started with building the Chrysler Building as highest building in the area (max build height). From their I build more and more buildings and streets. 

Every building has a real lobby and elevators to go to different floors and even to the roof. The buildings have shops on street level to. The only building that is fully furnished is the Chrysler Building, Metlife Building, Tower 49 and the Citigroup Center. 

Why am I building this? Because I really LOVE New York and because I'm inspired by other NY projects on Planet Minecraft :D 
Do you want to read a cool review? Read this! 

这个版本中的景点：
                地铁站
                火车站
                剧院
                教堂
                公园
                图书馆
                摩天大厦
接下来是图片：

注：此地图完成度为35%（作者说会一直做下去）
